biography: Ofri is a highly accomplished golfer who calls Golf Pirkkala his home club.

He has consistently demonstrated his skill and dedication to the game through his participation in the prestigious Hector Trophée.  This will be Ofri's fourth appearance in the tournament, having previously competed in 2023, 2024, and 2025. While he hasn't yet secured a victory in the Hector Trophée, his consistent presence speaks volumes about his commitment to excellence and his ability to compete at the highest level.

Ofri's steady improvement and unwavering focus make him a player to watch in this year's tournament. His strategic gameplay and precision shots are always impressive to see. He is an example of the commitment and patience needed to be successful in professional golf, and he is sure to be a strong contender in the competition for both the Hector Trophée and the Victor trophy.
